## ref() function

Returns a StorageReference for the given path in the default bucket.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ref(storageOrRef: types.StorageService | types.StorageReference, path?: string): types.StorageReference;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  storageOrRef | types.StorageService \| types.StorageReference | <code>StorageService</code> or <code>StorageReference</code>. |
|  path | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

types.StorageReference
